thread.title: Bollywood, cricket stars attend engagement bash for India's richest man's son

title: Bollywood, cricket stars attend engagement bash for India's richest man's son
text:
Bollywood, cricket stars attend engagement bash for India's richest man's son Tuesday, March 27, 2018 - 01:05 
The celebrities turned out to celebrate the upcoming marriage between the eldest son of India's richest man Mukesh Ambani, Akash Ambani, and his fiancée Shloka Mehta. Rough cut (no reporter narration)   
The celebrities turned out to celebrate the upcoming marriage between the eldest son of India's richest man Mukesh Ambani, Akash Ambani, and his fiancée Shloka Mehta. Rough cut (no reporter narration)  //reut.rs/2pOJVjR
